import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const Product = ({post}) => { const {cart} =useSelector((state) =>state); const dispatch = useD return (

{post.title}

{post.description}

{post.price}

{ cart.some((p)=>p.id ===post.id) ? () : () }
) } export default Product;
